variable.name: FM94
variable.description: HOURS SLEEP PER DAY (SELF REPORTED DATA - USE WITH CAUTION FM94 - FM99; FOR EACH INDIVIDUAL WHOSE SUM OF HOURS WAS BETWEEN 22-26, ALL ACTIVITY VALUES WERE KEPT. IF SUM<22 OR SUM>26, HOURS OF SLEEP WAS KEPT AND FM95-FM98 WERE SET TO MISSING.)

variable.name: FM95
variable.description: HOURS OF SEDENTARY ACTIVITY PER DAY (SITTING; SELF REPORTED DATA - USE WITH CAUTION FM94 - FM99; FOR EACH INDIVIDUAL WHOSE SUM OF HOURS WAS BETWEEN 22-26, ALL ACTIVITY VALUES WERE KEPT. IF SUM<22 OR SUM>26, HOURS OF SLEEP WAS KEPT AND FM95-FM98 WERE SET TO MISSING.)

variable.name: FM96
variable.description: HOURS OF LIGHT ACTIVITY (SELF REPORTED DATA - USE WITH CAUTION FM94 - FM99; FOR EACH INDIVIDUAL WHOSE SUM OF HOURS WAS BETWEEN 22-26, ALL ACTIVITY VALUES WERE KEPT. IF SUM<22 OR SUM>26, HOURS OF SLEEP WAS KEPT AND FM95-FM98 WERE SET TO MISSING.)

variable.name: FM97
variable.description: HOURS OF MODERATE ACTIVITY (SELF REPORTED DATA - USE WITH CAUTION FM94 - FM99; FOR EACH INDIVIDUAL WHOSE SUM OF HOURS WAS BETWEEN 22-26, ALL ACTIVITY VALUES WERE KEPT. IF SUM<22 OR SUM>26, HOURS OF SLEEP WAS KEPT AND FM95-FM98 WERE SET TO MISSING.)

variable.name: FM98
variable.description: HOURS OF HEAVY ACTIVITY (SELF REPORTED DATA - USE WITH CAUTION FM94 - FM99; FOR EACH INDIVIDUAL WHOSE SUM OF HOURS WAS BETWEEN 22-26, ALL ACTIVITY VALUES WERE KEPT. IF SUM<22 OR SUM>26, HOURS OF SLEEP WAS KEPT AND FM95-FM98 WERE SET TO MISSING.)

variable.name: FM99
variable.description: SUM OF ACTIVITY HOURS, FM94-FM98 (SELF REPORTED DATA - USE WITH CAUTION FM94 - FM99; FOR EACH INDIVIDUAL WHOSE SUM OF HOURS WAS BETWEEN 22-26, ALL ACTIVITY VALUES WERE KEPT. IF SUM<22 OR SUM>26, HOURS OF SLEEP WAS KEPT AND FM95-FM98 WERE SET TO MISSING.)
